bug.author: tjdwo13579
bug.description:
Extracted using cnn and rotation on -> Converted result shows the mask is in the wrong location I am no coding expert so I may be wrong but... could this be an issue with alignments?? I have tripled checked this with a clean repository of the most recent one with the supposed fix of rotation angle list parameter <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepfakes/faceswap/pull/380>#380</denchmark-link> which still showed this issue I also tested with an older repository with commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepfakes/faceswap/pull/365>#365</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepfakes/faceswap/tree/67009d0315fd6aaa2386f4a21fb9ee6b89cc05f3>here</denchmark-link>
which seems to work fine It's my first time writing an issue on github so I'm not sure if I'm supposed post this here

comments.comment: This should be fixed in latest commit (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepfakes/faceswap/commit/958493a64a317388301e8e8a71202b90e6af2f2e>958493a</denchmark-link> )
